doc:
Roger Vadim https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Roger_Vadim 0 Roger Vadim Plemiannikov (French: [ʁɔ.ʒe va.dim]; 26 January 1928 – 11 February 2000) was a French screenwriter, film director and producer, as well as an author, artist and occasional actor. His best-known works are visually lavish films with erotic qualities, such as And God Created Woman (1956), Barbarella (1968), and Pretty Maids All in a Row (1971). Roger_Vadim_Plemiannikov ( French : [_ʁɔ.ʒe va.dim_] ; 26_January_1928 – 11_February_2000 ) was a_French_screenwriter , film_director_and_producer , as_well_as an_author_,_artist_and_occasional_actor . His_best-known_works are visually_lavish_films with erotic_qualities , such_as And God Created Woman_(_1956_) , Barbarella_(_1968_) , and Pretty_Maids_All in a_Row ( 1971_) .
